content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the kėdainiai district court the court made a final decision regarding the division of property in a divorce case the applicant is responsible for a personal debt owed to a creditor named uab fa the applicant is seeking a dissolution of marriage due to the fault of the spouse and is also requesting child support payments and establishment of rights for their minor children the spouse has filed a counterclaim seeking dissolution of the marriage due to fault on both sides and child support payments both parties have requested the state to pay for their legal costs the court will consider the evidence and financial situation of both parties in making a decision the defendant has agreed to withdraw their case and the plaintiff is seeking damages for their daughter another person named m is involved in a case regarding residence and contact arrangements another person named r m has filed an application for the dismissal of part of the proceedings which is upheld the remaining counterclaims are upheld in full the marriage between r m and s m is annulled due to the fault of both spouses r m will retain the surname k while s m will retain the surname m additionally r m is declared to owe a personal debt to a creditor named uab fa the rest of the action is dismissed
